file.name: schema-refs.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers: []
paths:
  /cat:
    post:
      operationId: emkitten
      x-lepo-body-name: cat
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Cat'
      responses:
        default:
          description: Default response
  /pet:
    post:
      operationId: pet a pet
      x-lepo-body-name: pet
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
      responses:
        default:
          description: Default response
info:
  version: ''
  title: ''
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      discriminator:
        propertyName: petType
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        petType:
          type: string
      required:
        - name
        - petType
    Cat:
      description: A representation of a cat
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
        - type: object
          properties:
            huntingSkill:
              type: string
              description: The measured skill for hunting
              default: lazy
              enum:
                - clueless
                - lazy
                - adventurous
                - aggressive
          required:
            - huntingSkill
    Dog:
      description: A representation of a dog
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'
        - type: object
          properties:
            packSize:
              type: integer
              format: int32
              description: the size of the pack the dog is from
              default: 0
              minimum: 0
          required:
            - packSize
